name: HUNTRESS (Foletto)
description:
KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

Z = JUMP

X = SHOOT

Arrows = Movement

HUNTRESS is a speedrunning platform game where you have to find your way through challenges using your magic bow in creative ways.

It's the first game being released through the BONFIRE title.

Known issues: The audio takes too long to load. If you die too early in the game, before the audio files finish loading, the game will get stuck and you'll have to reset it (it will only happen once and only if you die in the first few enemies).

Check out the IndieDB page: http://goo.gl/gvZgDz
